name: URigVMCommentNode
doc:
Comment Nodes can be used to annotate a Graph by adding
colored grouping as well as user provided text.
Comment Nodes are purely cosmetic and don't contribute
to the runtime result of the Graph / Function.

methods.name: GetCommentBubbleVisible
methods.doc: Returns the current user provided bubble visibility of this comment.

methods.name: GetCommentColorBubble
methods.doc: Returns the current user provided bubble color inheritance of this comment.

methods.name: GetCommentFontSize
methods.doc: Returns the current user provided font size of this comment.

methods.name: GetCommentText
methods.doc: Returns the current user provided text of this comment.
